dcterms:creator: Y. Meidan
M. Bohadana
Y. Mathov
Y. Mirsky
A. Shabtai
D. Breitenbacher
Y. Elovici
dcterms:description: The N-BaIoT dataset represents a real IoT network consisting of nine devices, including a baby monitor, two doorbells, four security cameras, a thermostat, and a webcam. Data was collected during normal operation and various attacks conducted by the BASHLITE and Mirai botnet.
dcterms:title: N-BaIoT dataset

dcterms:creator: C. L. Tan
dcterms:description: The Phishing legitimate dataset comprises 48 features extracted from 10,000 web pages, with 5,000 being phishing pages and the other 5,000 being legitimate ones. This dataset is used for evaluating machine learning features in the context of phishing detection.
dcterms:title: Phishing legitimate dataset
